text: Post Mortem is a 2020 Hungarian mystery horror movie directed by Péter Bergendy and starring Viktor Klem, Fruzsina Hais, Judit Schell, Andrea Ladányi, Zsolt Anger. It has been selected as the Hungarian entry for the 94th Academy Awards in 2022. ==Other websites== * Category:2020 horror movies Category:2020s mystery movies Category:Hungarian movies Category:Movies directed by Péter Bergendy
title: Post Mortem (2020 movie)
